snippet: Tuesday’s selections from around the Web include reactions to Apple’s announcement of two new iPhones. Plus, the tale of a family that has been shunning all technology introduced after 1986.
abstract: Tuesday’s selections from around the Web include reactions to Apple’s announcement of two new iPhones. Plus, the tale of a family that has been shunning all technology introduced after 1986.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Applemania, and a Family Shunning New Technology
